ENGLISH 义务教育教科书英语 （一年级起点） 六年级上册 [中国] 河北 教育 出版 社 [加拿大] DC加拿大国际交流中心合作编写亲爱的同学们，欢迎你们进入六年级！ 这学期你们将了解李明在加拿大的生活、加拿大的季节特点以及重要的节日。 你们想知道李明和好朋友丹尼、詹妮在寒冷的冬季会做些什么吗？ 你们一定知道圣诞节。你们知道如何装饰圣诞树吗？你们还想了解更多关于圣诞节的习俗吗？你们想知道圣诞节和春节有什么异同吗？那就开始这学期的学习吧！ 同学们，这学期你们将学习用英语描述将来要发生的事情，这种语句有什么变化，有什么规律可循呢？在学习中，你们要注意发现语言的规律并能运用规律举一反三。这样，学好英语就非常容易了！ 同学们，你们要多参与英语学习活动，注意总结自己学习过程中的进步与不足，经常与老师和同学交流学习体会，探索适合自己的英语学习方法。相信你们一定能学得很棒！ 致同 学

content: 2 1 May I turn on the TV? Lesson 1 Let’s Watch TV! Jenny: Well, what should we do? What do you usually like to do on Saturday? Tom: I usually play football on Saturday afternoon. My father likes football, too. Danny: I usually watch TV. May I turn on the TV, Jenny? Jenny: Sure. It’s Saturday. Danny, Jenny, Li Ming and Tom are at Jenny’s house. Jenny: What TV programs do you like to watch? Tom: I like to watch football and basketball. Li Ming: I like to watch ping-pong. What do you like to watch, Danny? Danny: I like to watch talk shows. They always make me laugh. How about you, Jenny? Jenny: I like to watch Animal World . I learn a lot about different animals around the world. Li Ming: I like that program, too. Danny: ( He changes the channel. ) Here it is. I love animals. Jenny: Thank you, Danny.

Li Ming puts on his scarf, hat and gloves, too. At school, Mr. Wood says, “Oh! Look outside!” Everyone looks out the window. Snow is falling! “What a cold, snowy day!” says Danny. 19 2 I like to skate “Can you skate, Li Ming?” asks Danny. “No,” says Li Ming. “But I want to learn. Can you teach me?” “Sure!” says Danny. 3 Let’s do it! What do you like to do in winter, Danny ? Danny: I’m going to teach you to skate, Li Ming. These skates are for you. Put them on. Li Ming: Okay. Li Ming puts on his skates. 1 Can you skate? Oops! I fell down again! Danny: Can you stand up on the ice? Li Ming: Yes, I can. Look, Danny! I’m standing! Danny: Good! Danny stands up, too. Danny: Can you skate? Li Ming: I think I can. Come on! Danny: Oops! Danny falls down. Li Ming skates over to him. Li Ming: How did I do, Danny? Danny: You learn fast, Li Ming! Oops! Danny falls down again. Jenny: Are you okay, Danny? Can you stand up? content: 28 Lesson 12 The Snowman He played in the snow. He made a big snowman. He said, “Poor snowman! It’s cold! Put on a hat!” He took off his hat and put it on the snowman. The snowman opened his eyes! “Hello,” he said. “How are you?” “Yikes!” said John. He took his hat off the snowman. The snowman was a snowman again. One day, John said to his mother, “I am going to play in the snow.” “Okay,” said his mother. “Put on your coat.” John put on his coat. “Don’t forget your hat!” said his mother. John put on his hat. John put his hat on the snowman again. “Hello,” said the snowman. “You can talk!” said John. “What’s your name?” “I don’t think I have a name,” said the snowman. “What a cold, snowy day! What do you want to do? Can you play with me?” said John. But the snowman couldn’t go. He had no feet. John said, “Don’t worry! I can help you.” John put his skates under the snowman. “Can you skate now?” asked John. Story time

content: 29 Whoosh! The snowman could skate! He could skate very fast! “This is easy! This is fun!” he said. “Can we skate forever?” the snowman asked. “No. Spring is coming. Then comes summer and autumn,” said John. “Why can’t we skate in spring, summer and autumn?” asked the snowman. “Because it is too warm. There is rain, there is wind, but there is no snow and no ice,” said John. “And no snowmen,” said the snowman sadly. “No,” said John. “But don’t worry. I can help you.” At dinner time, John’s mother opened the fridge. “Arrrrr...!” she screamed! Hello. How are you ? What could the snowman do? Why was the snowman sad? What did John do for the snowman? content: 49 UNIT 4 Lessons 19~24 The Spring Festival 50 Jenny: Did you have fun at Christmas, Li Ming? Li Ming: Yes! The Christmas holiday was fun! Danny: Do you have any special holidays in China? Li Ming: Yes. We have many special holidays. My favourite one is the Spring Festival. Lesson 19 The Spring Festival 1 A special holiday in China Danny: What do you do for the Spring Festival? Li Ming: We wear new clothes. Jenny: That’s wonderful. Li Ming: We clean the house. We clean the doors, the windows and the floor. Li Ming: We also make dumplings. Jenny: I like dumplings. Danny: Me, too. Li Ming: And we visit our family and friends. Kids get lucky money. Danny: That’s interesting! I love the Spring Festival! Jenny: When is the Spring Festival? Li Ming: It’s on February 2 this year.

content: 60 Lesson 24 Year Animals How can I be the fi rst ? The Lion King wants to name the years. He asks the rat to help. The earliest to arrive will be the first. Everyone wants to be the first. The rat meets the cat. Hi little rat. Is the meeting on January 12 ? Err…Yes. In the afternoon. On January 12, the ox gets up very early in the morning. On his way to the meeting, he meets the rat. Okay! The ox runs and runs. He arrives at the meeting first. He’s very tired and sits down. The rat jumps in front of the ox. I’m the fi rst. Then the tiger comes. He is the third. I’m the third. We will have a meeting on January 12 in the morning. I will tell all the animals. Mr. Ox, I’m tired. Can I sit in your ear ? No. You are the second. I’m the fi rst. 1 3 5 2 4 6 Story time

It‛s a fun holiday. We buy a Christmas tree and put it up in our house. Then we put gifts under the tree. Also, we visit our family and friends. We give them gifts. We eat good food and sing Christmas songs together. What is the Spring Festival like in China? Your friend, Jack Christmas Dear Jack, How nice to get your email! The Spring Festival is coming in February this year. It‛s also a fun holiday. In January, we get ready for the Festival. We clean the house and buy new clothes. On the day of the Festival, we also visit our family and friends. We make dumplings together. And kids get lucky money. That‛s the Chinese Spring Festival. You can come to China one day and stay with us for the Spring Festival. Yours truly, Wang Hong
